title: Effects of spatial variability in vegetation phenology, climate, landcover, biodiversity, topography, and soil property on soil respiration across a coastal ecosystem
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Yinan He, Ben Bond-Lamberty, Allison N. Myers-Pigg, Michelle E. Newcomer, Joshua Ladau, James R. Holmquist, James B. Brown, Nicola Falco
